channel.name: ReceiverArgusLaPaz
channel.description: Recibe los mensajes HL7 y los distribuye a los difrentes canales segn el tipo de mensaje.

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: Receiver
com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.script:
var typeMessage = msg['MSH']['MSH.9']['MSH.9.2'].toString()
switch(typeMessage){ case 'A01': router.routeMessage('A01', connectorMessage.getRawData()) destinationSet.removeAllExcept('A01') break case 'R01': router.routeMessage('R01', connectorMessage.getRawData()) destinationSet.removeAllExcept('R01') break case 'O19': router.routeMessage('O19', connectorMessage.getRawData()) destinationSet.removeAllExcept('O19') break case 'A31': router.routeMessage('A31', connectorMessage.getRawData()) destinationSet.removeAllExcept('A31') break case 'A40': router.routeMessage('A40', connectorMessage.getRawData()) destinationSet.removeAllExcept('A40') break case 'S12': router.routeMessage('SIU12', connectorMessage.getRawData()) destinationSet.removeAllExcept('SIU12') break case 'S13': router.routeMessage('SIU13', connectorMessage.getRawData()) destinationSet.removeAllExcept('SIU13') break case 'S14': router.routeMessage('S14', connectorMessage.getRawData()) destinationSet.removeAllExcept('S14') break case 'S15': router.routeMessage('SIU15', connectorMessage.getRawData()) destinationSet.removeAllExcept('SIU15') break default: //router.routeMessage('A01', connectorMessage.getRawData()) break }

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;
